title: Update demo user credentials to bryanbarton45@gmail.com / alinalaura@24

requirements.summary: Update the pre-seeded demo user credentials in useEmailPasswordAuth.ts to email 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' and password 'alinalaura@24', removing any previously seeded demo credentials
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the login page and entering email 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' with password 'alinalaura@24' results in a successful login.
The previously seeded demo email (if different) no longer grants access.
Incorrect email or password still shows an appropriate error message.

file_operations.description: Update the pre-seeded demo user credentials in the authentication hook. Change the demo user email to 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' and update the password hash to match 'alinalaura@24'. Remove or replace any existing demo credentials that differ from these values. Ensure the djb2 hash function is applied to the new password for validation. Do not modify any other user data (name, balance, transactions) or change the authentication logic itself.
